50224.affected_area: Lower Mainland (Port Coquitlam, Maple Ridge, Mission and Abbotsford)
live_updates: Technicians are on site working to restore service as quickly as possible. No ETA at this time but we will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available. Thank you
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
50224.summary: Some customers in the Fraser Valley (Port Coquitlam, Maple Ridge, Mission and Abbotsford) are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
50224.title: Jun 2 - Lower Mainland (Various) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
